attributes.action: Eliminate the TV Licence fee now that programmes are easily accessible via the internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the advent of online viewing of TV films and programmes the charging of a licence fee to watch is now superfluous and should be stopped. All other channels use advertising to raise revenue so should the BBC

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
